title: Bug 6410: File dirtied by code assist without any changes
description: When using code assist, the file is marked as dirtied even though no changes have been made. However, the code assist does not appear as expected.
OB: When using code assist, the file is marked as dirtied without making any changes. Additionally, the code assist does not appear.
EB: When using code assist, the file should not be marked as dirtied if no changes have been made. The code assist should also appear as expected.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open a Java file.
2. Place the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call.
3. For example, consider 'I' to be the cursor here: 
   Object o = anotherObject.method(I);
4. Press Ctrl+Space to trigger code assist.
